params.1438:
Auto completes Mourning's End part 1 & all sub quests.
Select the Info button for details.
params.1446:
- All content from Elf I
- Access to Tirannwn
- Ability to use the Dragon Halberd
- Access to Zulrah
- Port Tyras charter ship

Free item from the Sage:
- Crystal Shield or Crystal Bow (500 charges)
